728340f-a.text:
Annadale Road, east side, at Genessee Avenue, viewing north and showing the Van Pelt House. The maps from 1874 to 1907 show it to have belonged to John and J.C. Van Pelt. In 1917 it was owned by Lillian Alling. Mr. Sperr refers to it as the C. Valentine residence (1926).
May 4, 1926
L. Sperr
728340f-a.folder: Annadale Road & Genessee Avenue, Staten Island, NY
